alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 5:01AM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Corson County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
